scripts.postinstall: node -e "if (process.env.VERCEL_ENV) { try { require('child_process').execSync('chmod +x node_modules/.bin/vite', { stdio: 'inherit' }); console.log('Permissions set for Vite on Vercel.'); } catch (e) { console.error('Failed to set permissions for Vite:', e.message); process.exit(1); } } else { console.log('Skipping permissions setup on local Windows/non-Vercel environment.'); }"
